md:
giải nghĩa từ "marathons" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Marathon (n) /ˈmærəθɒn/:
	+ Meaning: a long-distance running race, typically of 26 miles 385 yards (42.195 km)
	+ Vietnamese: cuộc chạy marathon (a marathon race)
	+ Example sentence: "She trained for months to complete the marathon."
	+ Related words: runner, athlete, competition, endurance

* Marathon (v) /ˈmærəθɒn/:
	+ Meaning: to engage in a long and tiring activity, especially one that requires a lot of effort and endurance
	+ Vietnamese: chạy marathon (to run a marathon); làm việc marathon (to work marathon)
	+ Example sentence: "We marathoned the entire TV series in one weekend."
	+ Related words: binge, session, long-haul, exhausting

* Marathon (adj) /ˈmærəθɒn/:
	+ Meaning: extremely long or tiring
	+ Vietnamese: dài marathon (marathon-long); mệt marathon (marathon-tiring)
	+ Example sentence: "The marathon meeting lasted for hours."
	+ Related words: lengthy, exhausting, grueling, demanding
html:
giải nghĩa từ "marathons" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Marathon (n) /ˈmærəθɒn/:

    • Meaning: a long-distance running race, typically of 26 miles 385 yards (42.195 km)
    • Vietnamese: cuộc chạy marathon (a marathon race)
    • Example sentence: "She trained for months to complete the marathon."
    • Related words: runner, athlete, competition, endurance

  • Marathon (v) /ˈmærəθɒn/:

    • Meaning: to engage in a long and tiring activity, especially one that requires a lot of effort and endurance
    • Vietnamese: chạy marathon (to run a marathon); làm việc marathon (to work marathon)
    • Example sentence: "We marathoned the entire TV series in one weekend."
    • Related words: binge, session, long-haul, exhausting

  • Marathon (adj) /ˈmærəθɒn/:

    • Meaning: extremely long or tiring
    • Vietnamese: dài marathon (marathon-long); mệt marathon (marathon-tiring)
    • Example sentence: "The marathon meeting lasted for hours."
    • Related words: lengthy, exhausting, grueling, demanding
